meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Guatemala, equal to 100 centavos.
meanings.sent1: In Guatemala, you can buy many things with just a few quezals.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for quezals before traveling to Guatemala.
meanings.sent3: The quezals in my wallet were having a party, jumping around happily.
meanings.sent4: Her savings grew like quezals multiplying in a magical money tree.
meanings.sent5: The shiny quezals sparkled in the sunlight, tempting me to spend them.

meanings.definition: A colorful bird of the trogon family, found in Central and South America.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful quezals chirped melodiously in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a pair of quezals with vibrant green and red feathers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to imitate the quezals' graceful flight.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as delightful as the song of quezals in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The elusive quezals danced in the air, a sight to behold for any nature lover.
